contentHtml: #71. How can we log the values that are commented out after the console.log statement? function* startGame() { const answer = yield 'Do you love JavaScript?'; if (answer !== 'Yes') { return "Oh wow... Guess we're gone here"; } return 'JavaScript loves you back ❤️'; } const game = startGame(); console.log(/* 1 */); // Do you love JavaScript? console.log(/* 2 */); // JavaScript loves you back ❤️ javascript A: game.next("Yes").value and
